description.p: NixChirp is a lightweight, Linux-first VTuber PNGTubing application. It displays animated avatars (GIF, APNG, WebM) that react to your microphone input, switching between idle and speaking states in real time.

ul.li: Mic-reactive avatar states with configurable thresholds
MIDI controller support for switching avatar groups
Global hotkeys via XDG Desktop Portal
Multiple output modes: windowed, chroma key, transparent, virtual camera
Virtual camera output via v4l2loopback for OBS integration

description.p: Initial release with all core features.
